mapper.select: SELECT c_contact_lens_manager.ID_card idCard, date_of_issue dateOfIssue, certificate_number certificateNumber, evaluate_score evaluateScore, staff.work_unit workUnit, staff.* FROM c_contact_lens_manager,staff WHERE c_contact_lens_manager.ID_card = staff.ID_card
mapper.insert:
insert into c_contact_lens_manager
ID_card,
date_of_issue,
certificate_number,
#{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dateOfIssue,jdbcType=DATE},
#{certificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update c_contact_lens_manager
date_of_issue = #{dateOfIssue,jdbcType=DATE},
certificate_number = #{certificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
